title: A Memphian's trip to Europe with Cook's educational party:
author: Watson, S.
snippet: At Aven is an ancient castle of Roman style, with five towers, built in the twelfth century.

title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Oh ! I know it by my own heart! Dearer to me isthe child Kenneth, who chaseth the butterfly on thebanks of the Aven, than ten sons who are mouldering in earth, or are preyed on by fowls ofthe air."
